original_text: This is what the Lord says: ‘I am going to deliver Pharaoh Hophra king of Egypt into the hands of his enemies who want to kill him, just as I gave Zedekiah king of Judah into the hands of Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon, the enemy who wanted to kill him.’”
korean_text: 보라 내가 유다의 시드기야 왕을 그의 원수 곧 그의 생명을 찾는 바벨론의 느부갓네살 왕의 손에 넘긴 것 같이 애굽의 바로 호브라 왕을 그의 원수들 곧 그의 생명을 찾는 자들의 손에 넘겨 주리라 여호와께서 이와 같이 말씀하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: This is what the Lord says:
I am going to deliver Pharaoh Hophra
king of Egypt into the hands of his enemies
just as I gave Zedekiah king of Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 유다 왕 시드기야를 넘긴 것처럼

sentences.original_text: into the hands of Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon
the enemy who wanted to kill him
